description:
While running devstack on an installation of ubuntu 12.04, 
the script exits with code 1 and msg 'nova-api did not start'

in the screen session, I see the following error msg: 

cd /opt/stack/nova && /opt/stack/nova/bin/nova-api
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/opt/stack/nova/bin/nova-api", line 41, in <module>
    from nova import service
  File "/opt/stack/nova/nova/service.py", line 41, in <module>
    from nova import wsgi
  File "/opt/stack/nova/nova/wsgi.py", line 28, in <module>
    from paste import deploy
ImportError: cannot import name deploy
Exception KeyError: KeyError(140704497270000,) in <module 'threading' from '/usr/lib/python2.7/threading.pyc'> ignored


The stack.sh log is here: http://paste.openstack.org/show/18123/
(also attached)
title: 'nova-api did not start'

comments.content:
While running devstack on an installation of ubuntu 12.04, 
the script exits with code 1 and msg 'nova-api did not start'

in the screen session, I see the following error msg: 

cd /opt/stack/nova && /opt/stack/nova/bin/nova-api
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/opt/stack/nova/bin/nova-api", line 41, in <module>
    from nova import service
  File "/opt/stack/nova/nova/service.py", line 41, in <module>
    from nova import wsgi
  File "/opt/stack/nova/nova/wsgi.py", line 28, in <module>
    from paste import deploy
ImportError: cannot import name deploy
Exception KeyError: KeyError(140704497270000,) in <module 'threading' from '/usr/lib/python2.7/threading.pyc'> ignored


The stack.sh log is here: http://paste.openstack.org/show/18123/
(also attached)
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~n-paladi

comments.content: Did u install the paste-deploy package and other dependencies?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~zyluo

comments.content:
pastedeploy is installed

is there a way to check the missing dependencies?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~n-paladi

comments.content:
OK, case closed: 
seems like the packages were somehow corrupted;
had to do an apt-get remove python-paste and python-pastedeploy and 
install them again
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~n-paladi
